meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a leaf.
meanings.sent1: The foliar patterns on the wallpaper made the room feel like a garden.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the foliar structures of different plants.
meanings.sent3: The foliar design on the dress made it look like a walking garden.
meanings.sent4: Her foliar earrings fluttered in the wind like delicate leaves.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a foliar scene that seemed to come alive on the canvas.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or situated on a leaf.
meanings.sent1: The foliar veins of the leaf were intricate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar crawled along the foliar surface of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The tiny foliar insect seemed to be dancing on the leaf.
meanings.sent4: The dewdrops glistened on the foliar edges of the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The foliar shade provided a cool spot to rest under the tree.

meanings.sent1: The foliar canopy of the forest was dense and green.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with a variety of foliar plants.
meanings.sent3: The foliar bouquet she received was a unique gift.
meanings.sent4: The foliar carpet under the tree rustled in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The foliar arrangement in the vase brightened up the room.
